name: NeoPhotonics Corporation
description: NeoPhotonics Corporation is a leading provider of advanced photonic solutions for high-speed communications networks. Founded in 1996 and headquartered in San Jose, California, NeoPhotonics specializes in the design and manufacture of optical components and modules that enable high-speed data transmission over fiber optic networks. The company's products are integral to the operation of data centers, telecommunications networks, and 5G infrastructure. NeoPhotonics is recognized for its innovative technologies, including coherent transmitters, receivers, and photonic integrated circuits, which enhance bandwidth and improve signal quality. With a focus on meeting the demands of the rapidly evolving communications landscape, NeoPhotonics is committed to driving advancements in optical networking through continuous research and development. The company's mission is to empower its customers with the tools needed to build the next generation of high-performance networks, facilitating global connectivity and data transmission. As the demand for faster and more reliable internet increases, NeoPhotonics is poised to play a critical role in the growth of the optical communications industry.
